column5: Beautiful, spacious, custom home on acre lot, located in gated community. Hardwood floors throughout, lots of natural light, 6000 square feet of living space.   Conveniently located between Denton and Frisco. Close to Starbucks, Whataburger, CVS, Wal-Mart.  Guests will have plenty of private living space, in addition to having access to a large, shared kitchen, outdoor living with fireplace, and laundry facilities.   Price listed is per room.
